ner: What Is Digital Humanities NB Refresh the page to get a new definition Quotes were pulled from participants from the Day of DH between 2009 2014 As of January 2015 the database contains 817 rows and randomly selects a quote each time the page is loaded If you want to do something cool with the data I am providing a download for the CSV I compiled here Made by Jason Heppler Problems Questions I m jaheppler on Twitter
